alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:49PM EDT until August 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Delaware County in central New York... West central Sullivan County in central New York... Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 648 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rutledgedale, or 9 miles north of Honesdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Honesdale, Damascus, Callicoon, Forest City, Cochecton, Waymart, Hancock, Vandling, Union Dale and Prompton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
